Description.Details: Clan Star Adder developed the family of Heavy Lasers in 3059 as a way of packing more punch into a relatively small package. All Heavy Lasers, however, build a tremendous amount of heat and interfere with a 'Mech's sensors. A subtle firing delay and interference with a BattleMech's sensors means that a Heavy Small Laser suffers with accuracy loss.

Modes.Name: Low Power Mode
Modes.Description: Using less Energy to create the Laser reduces heat generation at the cost of Damage.
